Directions: In a large bowl, combine the soup, mayonnaise and water. Stir in the next nine ingredients. Transfer to a shallow 2-1/2-qt. baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until rice is tender. Uncover; sprinkle with Parmesan topping and paprika. Bake 5 minutes longer.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  reduced-fat, reduced-sodium condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
